user.title: API Authentication
user.description: Please enter your VWorld and Kakao Developers API keys.

start_location.title: Set Start Location
start_location.description: Enter the location name and address of the starting point.

endpoint_location.title: Set Destination
endpoint_location.description: Enter the location name and address of the destination.

waypoint_location.title: Set Waypoint
waypoint_location.description: Enter the address of the waypoint.

error.need_api_keys: Both API keys must be entered.
error.address_not_found: Address not found. Please enter a valid address.
error.max_waypoints: You can set up to 5 waypoints.

init.title: Change Settings
init.description: Select waypoints to delete from the options below.
